desc: SoCal Milkweed specializes in growing pesticide free California native narrowleaf milkweed and 2 varieties of tropical milkweed. We also offer a wide variety of plants that will attract more pollinators such as butterflies, bees and hummingbirds to your yard!

layout.text: We offer a wide variety of plants and flowers that will attract more butterflies, bees and hummingbirds to your yard! Check back often, as we are continually adding plants and flowers as the weather warms!
